Uses of Class
net.sf.image4j.io.LittleEndianOutputStream

Packages that use LittleEndianOutputStream
net.sf.image4j.codec.bmp BMP codec implementation, which allows encoding and decoding of MS BMP format. 
net.sf.image4j.codec.ico ICO codec implementation, which allows encoding and decoding of MS ICO format.

static void BMPEncoder.write1(java.awt.image.Raster raster, LittleEndianOutputStream out)
          Encodes and writes raster data as a 1-bit bitmap.

          Encodes and writes raster data as a 24-bit bitmap.

          Encodes and writes raster data, together with alpha data, as a 32-bit bitmap.
static void BMPEncoder.write4(java.awt.image.Raster raster, LittleEndianOutputStream out)
          Encodes and writes raster data as a 4-bit bitmap.
static void BMPEncoder.write8(java.awt.image.Raster raster, LittleEndianOutputStream out)
          Encodes and writes raster data as a 8-bit bitmap.

          Writes the colour map resulting from the source IndexColorModel.
static void BMPEncoder.writeFileHeader(int fileSize, int dataOffset, LittleEndianOutputStream out)
          Writes the file header.

          Encodes the AND bitmap for the given image according the its alpha channel (transparency) and writes it to the given output.
static void ICOEncoder.writeFileHeader(int count, int type, LittleEndianOutputStream out)
          Writes the ICO file header for an ICO containing the given number of images.
